name: Vesper Girsu
text:
If your opponent controls 2 or more monsters than you do: Your opponent can send any number of monsters they control to the GY, also you apply these effects based on the number they control.
?0: Halve your LP. 
● 1: Your opponent gains 2000 LP. 
● 2: Banish your opponent's entire hand face-up until the End Phase. 
● 3+: Your opponent cannot activate monster effects for the rest of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Vesper Girsu" per turn.
